name: Beglov Style
storyline:
The action takes place - in prison (the initial scene), the main character woke up in the cell, his goal is to find a best friend. In a couple of weeks, he comes to a big city where he needs to find food, weapons and shelter in order to hide from zombies and fulfill his main goal - to find his friend
But in reality, everything is not so simple.....

The protagonist does not know that the air strike will be inflicted by the unification of the armies of all countries and that the last outbreak will be suppressed. The air strike will be delivered to the very center where it is located.
summary: KB was just a dangerous prisoner, but then something went wrong.... The protagonist fights for survival in a post-apocalyptic world.
